titles.title: A resolution designating March 22, 2014, as "National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
3/13/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates March 22, 2014, as National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day.
Commends rehabilitation counselors and professional organizations assisting those who require rehabilitation.
